Abstract:
There is ample amount of data on the internet available. But the data is in such a way that one cannot find the desired information from the ocean of data in specific format. Extracting precise, concise and useful information from larger sets of unstructured text data can be a tedious and time consuming task. For that, we try to convert this unstructured, raw text data into a specific format which can be used in such a way that important information with the use of knowledge graph is obtained. The user can fire queries as per their necessity and
based on the generated knowledge graph the required information from these large chunks of data can be retrieved. Knowledge Graph is an efficient way to visualise a trail of facts based on specific entities. It acquires and integrates information into ontology and applies a reasoner to derive new knowledge.
Hence, with the use of knowledge graph and text processing we aim to achieve efficient query based information retrieval system.

With the rapid advancement in technology, humans and machine are interacting more closely. Hence there is a need for a new way of communicating with the machine than the traditional approach. We are developing a way of using EMG(Electromyogram) sensor as an input device. We aim to provide a more immersive and interactive way of communicating with machines. The main advantage is that it will make communication much easier and intuitive.

There are large amount of data in particular domain over internet, if you ask any question then
it gives you the articles related to the question instead of the answer and reading that whole
data, it takes too much time. To get rid of this problem of time consumption in analysing data,
it can be achieved by our project “Smart Responser”. In which model works on the pre-
processed data and that data which has fetched from different domain. After pre-processing,
keyword extraction and model generation processes are considered to for further process to get
most appropriate and accurate answer of the question.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Website/Online Portal, Natural Language Processing

Abstract: Scrap Treasure Ingress is an Application which will handle scrap management or reuse.All the work will be verified by government and under admin so no fraudulent activities can be raised and information will be available on hand.

video surveillance by network of multiple cameras is a very important task due to increasing
crime and theft around us. Tracking people from video footage at public places like malls,
offices, educational institutions, restaurants has many applications and useful for various
business analytical tasks. Internet enabled security cameras and advancements in the field of
IOT in the last decade caused significant rise in video surveillance applications. Manual
analysis of videos from every camera is difficult and challenging work. Recent development
in computer vision techniques and deep learning has established research scope in the field of
automated video surveillance. Person reidentification aims to recognise and associate a target
pedestrian at different occasions after having previously appeared in several cameras with
non overlapping views. It enables automated tracking of pedestrian through different
disjointed camera views and focuses on learning and extracting feature representation of a
person.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Image Processing, Website/Online Portal

Abstract:
This Project “Smart Rides” is to aid the renting of cars through an online
system. It helps the users to search for available cars, view profile and book the
cars for the specific time period. It has a user-friendly interface which helps the
user to check for cars and rent them for the period specified. They could also
make payment online. It is an online system through which customers can view
available cars, register, view profile and book car. This system increases
customer retention and simplify car management. The goal of this project is to
automate car rental reservation so that customer need not to walk in or call in
order to book a cars. They can go online and reserves any kind of cars they
want from the available cars. This system includes various cars as per the
customer booking and comfort, it place the order and deliver the car as per the
location within the area. This Project also provide the facility of choosing the
driver as per his experience. Moreover this project helps many customers to
rent a car at a lower price.

Nowadays, Data is an integral and many precious parts of the internet. Day by day data
generated in thousands of terabytes, our idea is about sentimental analysis of text which taken
from different sites like twitter, amazon, Flipkart,etc.Like twitter has particular hashtag for a
tweet so we give a hashtag to analyse and for that particular hashtag we collect a data from
twitter then use it for analytics.In this way we also use for amazon and flipkart for price
comparison.

Project_name: Predicting trends with big data analytics
Abstract:
The need for knowing trend of any domain is important for planning and development of
any product for companies of different fields. This knowledge can save company from future
losses. Our portal will allow CEO’s or CTO’s or CIO’s of different companies to look at the
trends of their interested domain and will even be able to look at the future trends. The admin
will get the information of datasets, domain, and keywords provided by the company
CEO/CTO/CIO and will provide the trend analysis using Big Data Analytics and Machine
Learning Algorithms. They will be able to get graph of the trends of selected domain and
keywords and can then further plan their product development accordingly so that they can
maximize their profits.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Website/Online Portal, Natural Language Processing

Abstract:
This project is a web-based shopping system for an existing shop. The project objective is to
deliver the online shopping application into Web platform. This project is an attempt to provide the advantages of online shopping to customers of a real shop.
It helps buying the products in the shop anywhere through internet by using a computer. Thus, the
customer will get the service of online shopping and home delivery from his favourite shop within
4 hours. This system can be implemented to any shop in the locality having retail outlet chains.
If shops are providing an online portal where their customers can enjoy easy shopping from
anywhere, the shops won’t be losing any more customers to the trending online food delivery
application such as zomato or swiggy. Since it is a web application, it is easily accessible and
always available.

Project_name: Diabetic Retinopathy Detection Using Eye Images
Abstract:
Diabetic Retinopathy is one of the leading causes of blindness and eye disease in
working age population of developed world. This project is an attempt towards
finding an automated way to detect this disease in its early phase. In this project we
are using supervised learning methods to classify a given set of images into various
classes. For this task we are employing various image processing techniques and
filters to enhance many important features and then using neural for classification.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Image Processing, HealthCare/Medical

Abstract:
Our aim to design and create a system for a rental items Such as books, clothes,
furniture, cars etc. This enables admin can rent that product items that can be used by a
customer. By paying the money for specified period of time. This system provides efficient
way to the customer.
This software Rental Port has a very user friendly interface. Thus the user will feel
very easy to work on it. By using this system admin can manage their rental, booking,
customer issues, product item issues etc... The Rental Port system information can be added
to the system. Or existing rental port information can be edit or delete too by the admin. The
transaction reports of the rental port system can be retrieve by the admin, when its required.
Thus there is no delay in availability of any product information, whenever needed the rental
port information can be capture very quickly and easily.
The customer can also use the system to rent the items. The customer should create a
new account before logging in or he/she can log into the system with his/her create account.
Customer can view the product items without logging into the system. When
customer want to book any items on rental port they fill their details such as name, address,
E-mail, identity proof, time duration etc. and after paying the bill for product items.

Project_name: AUDIO SPEECH TO SIGN LANGUAGE CONVERTOR
Abstract:
Our motivation for the project is to allow people to communicate with people who are deaf and
impaired of hearing or impaired of speaking and understands sign language by using a program
that takes input as text or speech converts them into equivalent sign language animation and
displays it on a screen. Sign language is defined as the language of deaf and dumb people by using
which they are able to express their thoughts. By using sign language they can transmit messages
by combining hand gestures and different movement of hands. Sign language has their own
alphabets and grammar. By creating a system that converts Speech/text to sign language animation,
which is helpful for communication between normal people and people who are deaf and impaired
of hearing or impaired of speaking.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Website/Online Portal, Natural Language Processing

Abstract:
Nowadays, Data is an integral and many precious parts of the internet. Data can help us
to improve our life style with better results. Our aim is to create centralize portal for patients
data generated by Hospitals. Doctors use this platform to understand patient’s history and
diagnose them accordingly. Doctor’s can use technologies like data mining and AI features to
do their work faster. Government also use this for proper health care system for people.
What if all the past records of a patient gets stored on a single platform? What if his/her
past reports appears on a finger click? What if we could also get some "AkashVani" about the
diseases in our area? What if we have so called "Trends" based on seasons and locality based
diseases? How good and helpful it would become for the doctors to examine the patient and
give the accurate or best prescription as per his/her body's requirements. It would be like a boon
for all of us(the society). We could prepare ourselves by taking the necessary precautions
against the diseases that were declared in the "Trends" or "AkashVani".Our website will make
this happen. We are going to provide a central repository, which will contain all the past records
and reports of the users, spanning from each and every hospital and doctor he/she had visited.
This will help the doctors to identify the exact nurve of the patient, following which the
treatment becomes easier and accurate. We are also going to provide an AI based trend and
survey model. With the help of vast amount of data that we will receive and by mining which
we would be able to represent the 'seasonal diseases, their causes, remedies, and precaution
steps'.So, we are determined to make this planet a happy and healthy planet.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Website/Online Portal, HealthCare/Medical

Abstract: This AI Based Behaviour Analytics System will generate a feedback report automatically by system so, any restaurant’s receptionist don’t have to give feedback form to customer to fill it and customer don’t have to fill it because our system will fetch data or video from CCTV cameras which is already assembled in restaurant.  system will process on that video and detect facial expression of user and use facial expression algorithm to match it and give specific feedback report using deep learning technology.

To demonstrate how we can solve the problem of prosthetic arms for ampu_x0002_tees in the armed forces, people with disability, victims of various accidents, 
victims of amputation due to disease cancer, diabetes or trauma, etc.To develop indigenously produced externally powered prosthetic limbs 
that will be easily accessible and cost- effective.

The Student Accommodation System project has been formed to enhance the student experience by
providing students with a self-service accommodation booking system, while also significantly

reducing time-consuming manual processes for Residences staff. The project aims to implement a self-
service solution for students which will provide a user experience that meets student expectations of

online booking systems.

Today, Vehicles are increasing day by day. The problem of traffic has been
a big issue. Especially in metropolitan cities like Ahmedabad, Mumbai,
Delhi, Kolkata, Hyderabad, Bangalore it has been a very serious problem.
The management of this traffic is also very important. Currently it is being
done with the help of Traffic signal and Traffic Police. But, the problem with
the current scenario is that for every side there will be fixed timer and a
constant amount of time will be given to people on every side. Many times it
will lead to wastage of time and increase in traffic. Because it is possible that
one side of the vehicle have enormous amount of vehicles and while the other
few side might have very less amount of vehicles and we will allocate same
amount of time to all of them which will lead to wastage if time as well as
wastage of Energy. So our project is, with the use of ‘Image Processing’ and
‘Deep Learning’ we will make a system such that every side will have timer
according to the traffic density it has. Here first we will set up the camera at
the traffic signal upto certain distance and which will be used for shooting
videos and using these videos with the help of deep learning algorithms we
will identify the number of objects. Thus by knowing the density of the traffic
we can set our timers according to density. Which will lead to ‘Saving of
Energy’ as well as ‘Saving of Time’.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Image Processing, Smart city

Abstract: Stenny, an AI based system for speech to text conversion. It uses the trained models for processing, which generates transcript as a result that can be used for further needs.The result for the above will help in generating subtitles/captions for audio/video files which helps educational institutes.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Mobile Application, Website/Online Portal, Natural Language Processing

Abstract:
This project is focused towards changing the traditional way of buying
jewelry which includes going to the shop and selecting the specific jewelry
according to our requirements and also searching for one specific jewelry that we
saw somewhere. This whole process can be easily simplified by using up and
coming technologies like Machine Learning and Augmented Reality which help
user to find similar products with respect to one specific design and also let them
try available products from the site itself while sitting at home. This project is
basically e-commerce enhancement project which includes more than one functionalities to provide the user experience as best as possible. It includes user-
centric features like JewelTry: fastest and most accurate in the market and
internal usage features background removal and Generative Adversarial
Networks for automatic generation.

The main objective of project generator is to get project requirements as input and generate
backend coding of the project in java using spring MVC and hibernate frameworks. The end users of
this system would be company and college students. Although college students wouldn’t be allowed
to generate project, but they can have learning modules. Company which willing to pay would be
allowed to use software. It will get JAR file of the project and can download it.

We have studied over the years that students all over the world need financial assistance 
in order to excel in their field. The best aid to achieve this is earning scholarships from 
different platforms. We have come across the fact that many students are unaware of the 
number of available scholarships, they are eligible at. Also, to maintain the applied 
scholarships and updating various documents and deadlines becomes a cumbersome 
activity for the students. Compiling all the problems brings us to an assistive platform for 
scholarship, which is this project. It aims to provide a quick, accessible and friendly 
assistance for application and maintenance of scholarships.

There are many cases of violence in public places have been registered all over the
world. Thus, it is very important to deploy a surveillance System that can be used to
detect violent behaviors in video surveillance senarios for instance, raiway stations,
gymnasiums, and other public places. Many surveillance System still require human
supervison. However, Recent advances in computer vision are, thus, seen as a important
trend in video surveillance that could lead to dramatic efficiency gains. Our Aim is to
create a surveillance System that doesn’t require continuous monitoring of a stream of a
video. Our surveillance System will automatically process a video and detect violence
scene and send small video clip to the security agencies.

Dreck means something that is unwanted.So,Our project is based on detection
and collection of dreck.To detect and collect the dreck that is mainly present on
main roads or roadsides.Now,The question arises how to detect it,So for that
there will be camera on the roadside that will be operated by
municipality(Admin)if the dreck is detected then municipality will notify
cleaners to clean it and once it is done cleaners will notify them back,that work
is done.In this way we will get our surroundings clean.There is another
functionality of this project and that is for users. Here,Users will be the people
of local area.So if users have and sort of functions or programs at home and at
that day there will be huge amount of dreck,so inorder to clean it users will send
request message to municipality via our website and admin will manage it.

Climate change has affected the planet in a lot of ways already, with the scope of the damage
done to the planet and it’s habitants not even close to being estimated, it really is high time for
humanity as a whole to take a stance, and take personal action as well as political action, to
make sure the life on earth and the earth itself does not end up collapsing. This project and it’s
central component; the web application is a way to help the masses take the first step in doing
their personal part in saving the planet.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Image Processing, Website/Online Portal, High Performance Computing

Abstract:
SpeakQ&A is virtual assistant. Here Q&A means Questions and Answers. A Virtual Assistant
that can give answers to the questions. It is actually capable of voice interaction and playing
music, songs, providing weather as well other real time information. SpeakQ&A is specially
made for children. At the small age, children have lots of questions. The device can understand
questions and give answers based on machine learning. This device can be fitted in toy , So this
is like their new friend. The microphone is fitted in toy so whatever is said is actually transmitted
to server, where it is analyzed and the servers will transmit the most appropriate response back.

Monitoring and keeping tracking of your electricity consumption for verification
is a tedious task today since you need to go to meter reading room and take down
readings. Well it is important to know if you are charged accordingly so the need
is quite certain. Well we automate the system by allowing users to monitor
energy meter readings over the internet. Our proposed system uses energy meter
with arduino system to monitor energy usage using a meter .The meter is used to
monitor units consumed and transmit the units as well as cost charged over the
internet using Wi-Fi connection. This allows user to easily check the energy
usage along with the cost charged online using a simple web application. Thus
the energy meter monitoring system allows user to effectively monitor electricity
meter readings and check the billing online with ease. It presents a low cost and
flexible energy meter monitoring system using IOT.This technology offers new
and exciting opportunity to reduce our work and to prevent the equipments from
damages.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Mobile Application, Website/Online Portal, IoT, Smart city
Langauge: Python, C/C++, JavaScript, Node JS, HTML

Abstract:
In current system, there is no facility of online booking of appointments. Customers have to go
salon and book their appointment or book a telephonic appointment. It results in wasting of time
as customers have to wait for long time for their chance to come. Also there is no facility of
online product selling. There is no any facility of trainees to learn courses and customers are not
able to chat with the experts for tips.
In our proposed system, customers can book their appointments online. So it is less time
consuming. They can get a remainder by SMS before their treatments. They can buy online
products from our application. There is also a facility for trainees to learn courses. Customer can
see the listing of products used for the treatment and they have the choice to choose the product
to be used for their treatment. Customer can get tips from experts. Customer can chat with
experts if they have any problems for which they have to find a solution.

The Elegant Store is a Python Application (Django Framework). In this system user can
easily choose and pre-book clothes for any occasions. User can easily find the boutiques
and whatever cloth they want to take on rent, they can find on this website. Styling
assessment is also provided to the users whenever required. Users of the system can also act
as a dealer by providing their own cloths on rent. On return, fine can also be charged if the
product is received in damaged condition or returned after deadline. Different modes of
payments can be used by the user for payment such as mobile wallets, cards, COD etc. User
can also find the dress of the right size, length, colour, sleeve, body type, neckline, age,
trend and style.

Secure Smart Home, Name itself suggests that the objective of this project is to provide
automated system where one can access the instruments and household appliance remotely using
mobile/ tablet or other devices. Automation of anything like home, work area or office.
Automation can improve living standard and also make proper utilization of energy. Secure smart
home, It provides the enhanced safety features and end point control and coordination by an
android application. There is a Application GUI to use it efficiently. Nowadays most of people
clinging to the phone or smart device. Secure smart home can learn the user’s daily routine and
behaviour, It analyses and sets the priority according to it.
It also provide advanced fire safety features by making use of image processing. Concept
of fire safety and detection works on basis of analysis of image patterns and using machine learning
and image processing it detects the fire activity. The whole system is embed with Arduino control
board and wireless command and feedback system with Bluetooth configuration. There are sensors
like smoke, moisture and various utility sensors are also embed for better proposition and result.
Major advantage of this system is that It can reduce the electricity wastage by making it utilized
by Secure smart home configuration. It provides multitasking features and also have various
aspects which can improve living standards. Quick responsive platform makes it more reliable for
local use.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Image Processing, IoT

Abstract: p On transport service management system is a web_x0002_based application which can handle a variety of branches and departmental works of a typical transport agency

Project_name: Early Prediction of Sepsis from Clinical data
Abstract: “DSP(Deep Sepsis Predictor)” is a unique sepsis prediction mechanism that uses Deep Neural Network in order to predict  whether the patient has sepsis infection or not. DSP is built using the Keras framework written in python language. Sepsis is a severe disease which occurs when chemicals released in the bloodstream to fight an infection trigger inflammation throughout the whole body. This can cause many changes that damage multiple organ systems, leading them to fail, sometimes even resulting in death. Symptoms include fever, difficulty breathing, low blood pressure, fast heart rate and mental confusion.

Our project is about detecting the damage to the car. It is useful for car owners when their
car gets damaged and for insurance companies when they have to process insurance claims and
Garages for cost estimation and time estimation for repairing of external parts. Many times
insurance companies have to perform onsite checking of damaged cars to decide the amount to
be given to the victim of accident. Our project helps them to decide this.
Some of the main functionalities of our project is detecting car damage, helps in detecting fraud
i.e. if anyone tried to cheat the insurance company it can be detected, cost estimate for helping
the victim. The user will have to take pictures of the damaged car parts and upload them to the
website. After uploading the pictures, the insurance company operative will check them, verify
the validity of owner and provide the cost estimate.
Insurance company operative will be able to check the pictures uploaded on the website to
determine the claim amount to be provided to the victim of accident and validity of the
damaged car can be determined by detecting the number plate on the car. Also when car owner
uploads the pictures then he/she will be given approximate claim amount that he/she will be
receiving based on policy of insurance company.
Garages will be able to check the external damage done to the car like scratches, dents, broken
side lights, glasses, missing parts of the car etc. So it is easy to estimate the cost of the repairing
the car and provide the estimated time to repair the car. Garages can check the damaged parts
are available for replacing and if, the parts are not available then they can order them.
Project_area: AI/Machine Learning/Data Mining, Image Processing, Website/Online Portal

After Buying the Flat we Provide Services to Customer from Booking to Possession are as:
Payment schedule, flat construction work percentage, get latest photos of flat, Allotment letter, billing

In Today’s Scenario, doctors need to access the critical medical history of the patients
especially as number of road accidents are increasing and when they are treated in
the hospital the doctor needs to conduct tests before starting the treatment to check
the patient’s medical history. So our little effort is to provide an application which
maintains the medical records about the patient so the doctor can start the treatment
of the patient immediately. This saves the critical life of the person as well as the
doctors time. It also removes the need to carry the files.

The prime purpose of the project is to make surveillance
monitoring completely autonomous. It is done by unifying multiple
surveillance cameras of a particular system and by maintaining the
visual log of personal activities. With the help of spaghetti diagram
(bird eye map), person in a system can be tracked. It is designed to
eliminate the need of manual control room. The system will be fully
automatic and capable of deciding whether the area under the
surveillance is under-control or not! Further, the human activity on
the system can be recognized. In short, live object detection, face
identification and human-system interaction are the key features of
this project. It can be applicable in sports analysis, banking systems
or in big enterprises.

“Chatting is a method of using the technology to let people share ideas despite of the geographical
barriers. PLAY is an android application which is used to make conversion between one user to
another. To start chatting client should get connected to a server where they can do private and
group chat securely. PLAY has a one special Daily Group feature that is used to connect an
unknown member of their nearby geographical area. Unknown people can share their thought or
media using this group and other members can report if it is a spam message. PLAY provides the
best security to encryption and decryption techniques to each and every message conversation.”

that is of importance of either an educational intuition or a college. The system

Edify will be one of the online learning platform with interactive GUI and added

Abstract:
A website which allows you to build your own PC by just selecting your specifications and placing an order. You can also get various services such windows installation, update our PC or any hardware solution

Traditionally landfills are the first standard technique of organized waste
disposal and stay thus in several places around the world. Our system is made for such
org which want to take the garbage from the people home and take it to the dumping
yard where it can be stabilized and made harmless. For this one user will request to pick
the garbage from home at a particular time and then system staff will come to them with
their vehicles and load the garbage into it and take some cost and bump it to the dumping
area. Hence this system helps in making the environment clean.

Nowadays, Online shopping has become an essential part of our life. From a pen to pizza, a
fan to fridge - anything you say - is available for online shopping except the wholesale
goods. Our project is to implement a delivery system between wholesaler and the retailer with
tracking facility to increase their scope of the business. As a result, a shopkeeper is not bound with only one local wholesaler. He can check out
more wholesalers with best offers. A wholesaler can grow his business after getting more shopkeepers.
